sn22.10:1.2: “Mendicants, form of the past and future is suffering,
sn22.10:1.4: Seeing this, a learned noble disciple doesn’t worry about past form,
sn22.10:1.5: doesn’t look forward to enjoying future form,
sn22.10:1.6: and they practice for disillusionment, dispassion, and cessation regarding present form.
sn22.10:1.10: Consciousness of the past and future is suffering,
sn22.10:1.12: Seeing this, a learned noble disciple doesn’t worry about past consciousness,
sn22.10:1.13: doesn’t look forward to enjoying future consciousness,
sn22.10:1.14: and they practice for disillusionment, dispassion, and cessation regarding present consciousness.”
